scripts.backend: cross-env-shell "cd fastapi/api && (if exist env\Scripts\python.exe (env\Scripts\python.exe -m uvicorn main:app --reload) else (env/bin/python -m uvicorn main:app --reload))"
scripts.worker: cross-env-shell "cd worker && (if exist env\Scripts\python.exe (env\Scripts\python.exe main.py) else (env/bin/python main.py))"
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n FRONTEND,BACKEND,WORKER -c "cyan,green,yellow" "npm run frontend" "npm run backend" "npm run worker"
